source: TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_SEQ_00<tab>Mogmug is flitting about frantically looking for someone to do his bidding.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_SEQ_00<tab>モグモグホームのモグムグは、ふわふわと漂いながら悩んでいるようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_SEQ_01<tab>Mogmug has asked the newest member of his fan club─you─to gather four sankchinni vines. Head north of Moghome and gather the vines.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_SEQ_01<tab>モグムグに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ADF01 /var>の調達を頼まれた。ドラヴァニア雲海のエイル・トームで<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E1D01 /var>を倒し、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ADF01 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_SEQ_02<tab>The sankchinnis fall easily. Gather their vines and return to Mogmug.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ADF01 /var>を入手した。モグモグホームの「モグムグ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ADF01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_SEQ_03<tab>Mogmug is pleased at your obedience, and plans to use the vines to make a harp that will charm the attendees of the harvest fête, further expanding his army of fans.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_SEQ_03<tab>モグムグに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ADF01 /var>を渡した。音楽祭に向け、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ADF01 /var>を使った竪琴を作るようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_TODO_00<tab>Slay sankchinnis and collect their vines.
TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_000<tab>...Oh! You've returned to bask in my alluring aura! One can never have too many devotees... Say, I have just the job for a fledgling fan, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_000美しいくぽ……なんてモグは美しいくぽ……。
こんな美しいモグは、とても汚れ仕事なんてできないくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_001<tab>I require four vines from the sankchinnis that reside north of Moghome. An ardent admirer such as yourself surely will not deny me!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_001冒険者さんに、お願いくぽ。
から「」を4本ほど、
取ってきてほしいくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_010<tab>I dare not soil my immaculately groomed coat. Bring me four sankchinni vines and I'll be ever so grateful!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_010冒険者さんに、お願いくぽ。
から「」を4本ほど、
取ってきてほしいくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_020<tab>My steadfast serv─I mean <var 1A 02 /var>supporter<var 1A 01 /var> has returned! Did the sankchinnis prove to be any trouble, kupo?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_020冒険者さんに、お願いくぽ。
から「」を4本ほど、
取ってきてほしいくぽ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_021<tab>Magnificent! Marvelous! Such beauteous vines <var 1A 02 /var>almost<var 1A 01 /var> make me green with envy. With these I'll make the most harmonious harp in Moghome, and moogles for malms around will be enraptured when I perform at the harvest fête. Come and lend your voice to the cheers of my fabulous fans, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ402_01820_MOGMUG_000_021素晴らしいくぽ～！　モグほどじゃないけど美しいくぽ！
これで音楽祭に向けて、最高の竪琴を作れるくぽ！
美しいモグが、美しい竪琴で、美しい音楽を奏でるくぽ！
